FOUND IN: Meerkat (often used interchangeably, though technically not the same species as suricates are a part of the meerkat family)
Beetlebug (nickname for the Volkswagen Beetle, a classic compact car)
Eggy (many would consider an omelette to be "eggy" due to its main ing.content)
Dove - commonly associated with peace, especially in Western cultures where it is often depicted carrying an olive branch.
